name: heart-diagnostic-system
description: AI-powered heart disease diagnostic system with Vue.js frontend and Spring Boot backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && ./mvnw dependency:resolve
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../backend && ./mvnw clean
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d

author: Heart Diagnostic Team
